column2: JINYA is a nationwide-franchise concept that has specific aesthetic and operational standards we must follow. Moreover
column3: since the beginning of this year
column4: the food-service and hospitality industry has been facing supply-chain issues affecting not only our ability to source specialty-imported food items
column5: but also nearly every aspect of our operations from wine and liquor to cleaning supplies. This
column7: has helped to drive prices higher in nearly every category of our business.
